longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for a minimum of 45 days beyond the period of intended
  stay. 
 - Hong Kong (SAR China) passports and/or passport replacing
   documents must be valid on arrival. 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Additional Information:
- Visitors must hold all documents required for next
  destination. 
- Bermuda Immigration officers will decide on max. period of
  stay (up to 6 months) for holders of Hong Kong (SAR China)
  passports depending on reason for travel.
Warning:
- Visitors not holding one of the following could be refused
  entry:
  - return/onward tickets; or 
  - a Letter of Employment or Letter of Guarantee from
  prospective employer in Bermuda; or
  - a Landing Permit
